name: wikipedia.org - Mepis blue (adlc)
description:
This is a light blue redesigned Wikipedia based on Mepis default colors scheme.
It has a blue Wikipedia logo embedded and uses a white circle as bullet.

Other styles based on the same rules set:
style 6044
style 6069
style 6080
style 6083
style 6157
style 6464

Ubuntu coffee beans styles:
style 7201

LCARS redesigned styles:
style 6594
style 6510
style 6738
